alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:09PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dona Ana County through 745 PM MDT... At 709 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Afton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corralitos. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 113 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
